text: Edmond Alphons Antoine Marie Classen (May 16, 1938 - January 27, 2014) was an Dutch movie, stage, and television actor. Classen appeared on many movies and over 50 television shows since his career began in 1975. His first role was in Amsterdam 700. His last role was in the 2012 movie Black Out. Classen was born on May 16, 1938 in Arnhem, Netherlands. His daughter, Kiki Classen, is also a Dutch actress. Classen died on January 27, 2014 in his home in Arnhem, Netherlands from heart failure, aged 75.Acteur Edmond Classen overleden ==References== ==Other websites== * * List of Classen's movie and biography Category:1938 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:People from Arnhem
title: Edmond Classen
